details:
Date: January 9 - 16, 2026.
    
    Create. Share. Win Diamonds!
    Create any content featuring Vinzz Tools and win shiny rewards!
    
    1. Content type: Video
    2. Style: Edits, Tutorials, Flex Skins, and more
    3. Platform: Tiktok
    
    Requirements:
     1. Follow Vinzz. (@vinzzzml) on TikTok then tag "@vinzzzml" in your caption.
     
     2. Hashtags Required:
     #vinzztools
     #injector
     #(last two digits of your Game ID. example: #67)
     
     —————————————
     
     Submission on Instagram:
      1. Follow @kioshi_vin on Instagram.
      2. Copy the link of your content.
      3. Message your full Game ID & Server ID and content link.
      
     Rewards:
      1. Best content: 500 diamonds
      2. Excellent content: 300 diamonds
      3. Great content: 100 diamonds
      4. Good content: 5-50 diamonds
      
     Note:
      1. It must be a new video related to Vinzz Tools only.
      2. Make sure to follow the Requirements completely. Otherwise, your content may be ignored.
      3. Please do not steal other people's content.
